title: The future of news is happening where no one is looking
description: Every December, when Nieman Lab asks for predictions, I think: Why ask journalists to forecast the future when most of us are still forecasting payroll? But this year, I have a clearer sense of where things are headed. In 2026, the people shaping the future of news won’t be in newsrooms. They won’t have titles,...
